item.title: Q & A on Agile Portfolio Management
item.description: A while ago I held and internal session on Agile Portfolio Management. I found some questions interesting, so I share my answers here. Q: How to measure the improvement of an agile Team, which indicator to use? A: There are three useful values to monitor. One is the Team’s velocity: it should go up sprint after sprint, suggesting that the Team gets more and more efficient; the initial sprints are usually irregular.
